# Issue 11: Create DevTools Tutorial Videos/Docs

Create step-by-step tutorials showing how to use DevTools for common tasks.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] **Tutorial 1**: Getting Started (build Rust CLI, connect, basic commands)
- [ ] **Tutorial 2**: Testing Combat (spawn enemies, test different scenarios)
- [ ] **Tutorial 3**: Map Editing (manipulate tiles, save custom maps)
- [ ] **Tutorial 4**: Writing Automation Scripts (Python examples)
- [ ] **Tutorial 5**: CI/CD Integration (automated testing)
- [ ] Video recordings or animated GIFs (optional)

## Location

`docs/dev-tools/tutorials/`

## Labels

- `documentation`
- `dev-tools`
- `good first issue`

## Milestone

DevTools v1.1
